I really doubt she's liable to change, especially since there seems to 
be more than one mind directing the Ellen Rivers persona.  I've seen 
people on another message board (superbard.com, if you're wondering) 
pull some annoying tricks, and I see it in real life, too.  They all 
smile sweetly, say "I'll change", then pick up right where they left 
off.  Ellen, prove me wrong - if you can!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> That's what people said about me, and I did finally
> improve (somewhat).  I had almost the exact same
> problems as her (although it did take 2 months of
> moderation to straighten me out).
> 
> --- cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: Never thought I'd catch myself saying this, but
> > you're absolutely 
> > right, HN.  Moderators, PLEASE GIVE THAT BITCH THE
> > BOOT!  She's 
> > obviously not going to learn any better, so why are
> > you waiting?
